title: Configurations JSON schmea
description: Schema of configurations JSON file which used by HTTP transports

monitoringPointConversions.description: An object where keys are the URL parameters, values are the pattern of the monitoring point ids, represented by #-signs. Number of # signs will be the length of replaced values in URL

observedPropertyConversions.description: An object where keys are the ID of the property. Values are objects, where keys are the ID of the parameter, values are the replaced values
